headline: EPAM Q1 Earnings Call: Leadership Transition and AI Demand Shape Outlook
summary: Digital engineering services company EPAM Systems (NYSE:EPAM) fell short of the market’s revenue expectations in Q1 CY2025, but sales rose 11.7% year on year to $1.3 billion. Its non-GAAP EPS of $2.41 per share was 6.1% above analysts’ consensus estimates.
